help.description: Sends a complete data block (4 values) to a TA CMI via CoE.
help.dataType: Analog (4 values) or Digital (4 bits from block 0 or 9)
help.blockMapping: Analog: 1-8 directly to CoE blocks 1-8. Digital: 1-4 → Block 0 (bits 0-15), 5-8 → Block 9 (bits 0-15)
help.inputs: 4 fixed inputs (Out 1-4 for Analog, Bit 1-4 for Digital)
help.debouncing: Values are buffered for 100ms to prevent overwriting
help.atomic: All 4 values are sent together as atomic update
